content:
Recently the unsupported_calling_conventions lint was introduced, and I ran into it today and noticed that there is no issue linked. The current output has issue #00000 and a link to issue 00000. This appears to be on purpose, however it would be quite useful if an issue was created and linked to help further explain the problem with the code and provide more information to help solve it, as the current lint doesn't have any suggestions or info, it simply says "not supported."

re @nagisa
Aha not on purpose at all just slipped my mind.
I'll try to not forget but would be great of you could file an issue for this
